name: Tilt Brush Sketch
summary: A TILT file is a digital painting created in Tilt Brush, a virtual reality painting application developed by Google. It contains a 3D image, commonly referred to as a sketch, that a user created using Tilt Brush, a VR headset, and a controller. TILT files are typically stored in a user's Documents/​Tilt Brush/​Sketches directory.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
